import Brand from "../components/Brand"; import {useForm} from "react-hook-form"; import React, {useState} from "react"; import {ajouterAuction} from "../services/EnchereService"; export default function AddAuction(){ const{handleSubmit, register} = useForm() const [press, isPress] = useState(false); const [message, setMessage] = useState(null); function submit(data){ isPress(true) const client = JSON.parse(sessionStorage.getItem("client")); data.idClient = client.id; ajouterAuction(data).then(res => { }) } return( <>
